mean_cn: vt. 夺去，剥夺，免去…的职务，使丧失
mean_en: to take something away from someone or something :to not allow (someone or something) to have or keep (something)
word_etyma: de从...拿走 + prive抢劫 → deprive 拿走
short_phrase: deprive his brother of his toy
sentence: The baby cried as his friend deprived him of the toy.
sentence_trans: 男孩儿的朋友抢走了他的玩具使他大哭。
